scripts.compile:meson: cd native && meson setup build && meson compile -C build
scripts.crosscompile:meson: cd native && CXX=clang++ meson setup -D cross_compile=true build && CXX=clang++ meson compile -C build
scripts.compile:native: npm run compile:koala:interop && npm run compile:meson && npm run copy:.node
scripts.crosscompile:native: npm run compile:koala:interop && npm run crosscompile:meson && npm run copy:.node
scripts.compile: npm run compile:native && npm run compile:js
scripts.compile:release: npm run crosscompile:native && npm run compile:js
scripts.compile:js: npm run compile:src && rm -rf lib/ && rollup -c rollup.lib.mjs && rollup -c rollup.es2panda.mjs
scripts.run: npm run compile && npm run compile:plugins && npm run direct
scripts.run:memo: npm run compile && npm run compile:plugins && npm run compile --prefix ../memo-plugin && npm run memo
scripts.test: npm run compile:native && npm run test:light
scripts.test:golden: npm run compile:native && TEST_GOLDEN=1 npm run test:light
scripts.compile:playground: cd playground && meson setup build && meson compile -C build
scripts.panda:sdk:install: cd ../../incremental/tools/panda && echo "Installing panda sdk $npm_package_config_panda_sdk_version" && PANDA_SDK_VERSION=$npm_package_config_panda_sdk_version npm run panda:sdk:install
scripts.panda:sdk:reinstall: npm run panda:sdk:clean && npm run panda:sdk:install
scripts.regenerate:current: rimraf -rf src/generated && npm run compile -C ../../../arktscgen && node ../../../arktscgen --panda-sdk-path $npm_package_config_panda_sdk_path --output-dir ../ --options-file ./generator/options.json5 --no-initialize --debug
scripts.reinstall:regenerate: npm run panda:sdk:reinstall && npm run regenerate && git diff --shortstat
